name: no-guard

effect.black-white: Due to a glitch, moves affected by this ability have a (100 - accuracy)% chance to hit through detect or protect.
effect.black-2-white-2: Due to a glitch, moves affected by this ability have a (100 - accuracy)% chance to hit through detect or protect.

short_effect: Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokémon hit.

flavor_text.black-white: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.
